abouts.title: Web Development
abouts.description: Experienced in handling project in scope of research and web development as a web developer. I have knowledge on Laravel framework, PHP, Vue JS, Angular, React JS, Tailwind or Bootstrap CSS, and Jquery to build an Website.

abouts.title: User Experience
abouts.description: Individuals who express a keen interest in the realm of User Experience (UX) within the context of website development dedicate their efforts to the creation of an optimal, efficient, and gratifying user experience.

abouts.title: AR Filter Creator
abouts.description: I design and develop interactive augmented reality experiences that blend creativity with technology, engaging users through platforms like Instagram and TikTok,
